channel.title: 中元仪器 on 木子洋
channel.description: Recent content in 中元仪器 on 木子洋

item.title: 中元尿机1600
item.description:
接口说明

仪器厂商 中元尿机1600
 仪器型号 中元尿机1600
通讯方式 单向|双向☑|主动上传
 仪器类型 临检尿机
医院名称
程序名称
终端服务器地址 终端服务器端口号

仪器上接口标示和接口类型

  1. 接口类型：串口|网口☑|监听文件|数据库|其他
  2. 连接方式：HL7协议☑|ASTM协议|监听文件|数据库|其他

仪器接口说明

  • 连接需要回复才能连接成功
  • 传输数据也要回复，否则会掉线

串口盒子配置

  • 波特率： 9600
  • 数据位：8
  • 停止位： 1
  • 校验位： N

仪器图片

仪器配置

数据格式

连接传输，通过MSH中QRY命令返回DSP^Q01串

1
2
3
4
5
6
7

3

///仪器名称：凝血CX-9000
///仪器厂商：迈瑞
///通讯方式：TCP/IP,HL7,双向
///编 写 者：hz
///编写日期：2023-04-06
MIFU3600(mi) 
  S mi=$g(mi) i '$l(mi) q
  Q:'$D(^dbo.BTMIMachineParameterD(mi))
  S par4=$li(^dbo.BTMIMachineParameterD(mi),10)
  S par9=$li(^dbo.BTMIMachineParameterD(mi),11)
  S par11=$li(^dbo.BTMIMachineParameterD(mi),12) 
  S par10=$li(^dbo.BTMIMachineParameterD(mi),13)
  S:$L(par10) par10=$ASCII(par10)
  S:$L(par11) par11=$ASCII(par11)
  s stx=$c(2),etx=$c(3),ack=$c(6),enq=$c(5),eot=$c(4),etb=$c(23)
  s lf=$c(10),cr=$c(13),nak=$c(21),sb=$c(11),eb=$c(28)
 
  i $$Start^MI.MIF000(mi) q
  f  d Main i $$Stop^MI.MIF000(mi) q
  c par4
  q
ErrHandler
    h 10
    d Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,$tr($ZERROR,"^","--")_".错误代码:"_$ECODE,"Runtime Error")
    q
Main
  SET $ZTRAP="ErrHandler",$EC=""
  s (AllRecord,chl,res,epis,episRecord,result,resultStr,mshStr,barcode,graphData,graphType,ret,resType,date,time,QC) = ""
  s record=$$Read^MI.MIF000(mi,sb,eb) 
  ;s record=$$Read^MI.MIF000(mi,"","") 
  q:'$l(record)
  d Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,record,"record<--M")
  d Result
  q
Last 
  
  i $l(epis),$l(result) d
  .d Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,epis_"&"_result,"result<--M")
  .d Save^MI.MIF000(mi,epis,result,date,time,QC) 
  //s (AllRecord,chl,res,epis,episRecord,result,resultStr,mshStr,barcode,date,time,QC)=""
  q
Result
  f i=1:1:$l(record,$c(13)) d
  .s resultStr=$p(record,$c(13),i)
  .q:resultStr=""
  .d Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,resultStr,"resultStr")
  .s headType=$p(resultStr,"|",1)
  .//MSH|^~\&|BC-6800|Mindray|||20140910100530||ORU^R01|1|P|2.3.1||||||UNICODE
  .i headType="MSH" d
  ..s mshStr=resultStr
  ..s msgRoutine=$p($p(resultStr,"|",9),"^",1)
  ..D Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,msgRoutine,"msgRoutine")
  ..i msgRoutine="ORU" d
  ...D SendACK(mi,resultStr,"AA",0,"Message accepted")		// 暂时屏蔽不回复
  ..//MSH|^~\&|EXU|U3600|||20231016162331||QRY^Q01|4|P|2.3.1|U3600221200144||【13】
  ..i msgRoutine="QRY" d
  ...D SendACKNew(mi,resultStr,"AA",0,"Message accepted")
  .//QRD|20210818151949|R|D|1|||RD|9230883|OTH|||T|QRF|F3999|20210818151949|20210818151949|||RCT|COR|ALL||
  .//QRD|20220111135302|1|||SampleID|<CR>
  .I headType="QRD" d
  ..s barcode=$p(resultStr,"|",5)
  ..d SendQRD(mi,resultStr,barcode)
  ..;d SendQRD(mi,resultStr,"AA",0,"Message accepted",mshStr,barcode)
  .//ORC|RF||SampleID1
  .I headType="ORC" d
  ..s barcode=$p(resultStr,"|",4)
  ..q:barcode=""
  ..d SendDSR(mi,resultStr,"AA",0,"Message accepted",mshStr,barcode)
  .i headType="OBR" d
  ..s epis=$p(resultStr,"|",4)
  .//OBX|8|NM|6690-2^WBC^LN||2.20|10*9/L|4.00-10.00|L~A|||F
  .i headType="PID" d
  ..s chl=$p(resultStr,"|",11)
  ..s res=$p(resultStr,"|",12)
  ..s res=$tr(res,"%")
  ..s result=result_chl_$c(92)_res_$c(44)
  .i headType="OBX" d
  ..s resType=$p(resultStr,"|",3)
  ..s ImageType=$p(resultStr,"|",8)
  ..;i resType="NM" d
  ..s chl=$tr($p($p(resultStr,"|",3),"^",1)," ")
  ..s res=$p(resultStr,"|",4)
  ..i res[" " s res=$p(res," ")
  ..;i (chl="VC")||(chl="MALB") s res=+res
  ..i (chl="URO")&&(res["Normal") s res="阴性"
  ..s res=$tr(res,"mmol/L")
  ..s res=$tr(res,"mg/L")
  
  ..i "^UNCX^CAPH^AUCR^MAPH^COM^CID^URIC^TYRO^"[("^"_chl_"^") d //处理结晶合并结果累加
  ...S ^Tmpsch("MI.MIFU3600",mi,epis,"JJ")=$g(^Tmpsch("MI.MIFU3600",mi,epis,"JJ"))+res
  ...s res=""
  ..i "^SUCO^BACI^"[("^"_chl_"^") d //处理细菌合并结果累加 
  ...S ^Tmpsch("MI.MIFU3600",mi,epis,"XJ")=$g(^Tmpsch("MI.MIFU3600",mi,epis,"XJ"))+res
  ...s res=""
  ..i $p(resultStr,"|",2)=51  d  //处理结晶合并结果累加后清除
  ...s result=result_"JJCount"_$c(92)_+$g(^Tmpsch("MI.MIFU3600",mi,epis,"JJ"))_$c(44)_"XJCount"_$c(92)_+$g(^Tmpsch("MI.MIFU3600",mi,epis,"XJ"))_$c(44)
  ...k ^Tmpsch("MI.MIFU3600",mi,epis)
  ..i $l(chl),$l(res) s result=result_chl_$c(92)_res_$c(44)
  ..i ImageType["IMG" d
  ...//OBX|71|红细胞(RBC)|Qk1GBwAAA
  ...S graphData=$p(resultStr,"|",4)
  ...q:graphData=""
  
  ...s flag=$P($p(resultStr,"|",3),"^",1)
  ...s graphType=flag
  ...i flag="红细胞(RBC)" s graphType="HRBC" //图片名转换
  ...i flag="白细胞(WBC" s graphType="HWBC" //图片名转换
  ...S base64Stream=##Class(%GlobalCharacterStream).%New()
  ...D base64Stream.Write(graphData)
  ...s ftpFfolderName="ZY1600"
  ...d Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,epis_"^"_graphType_"^"_ftpFfolderName,"graph")
  ...;s ret=##Class(MI.Instrument).SaveBase64StreamToGraph(base64Stream,mi,epis,graphType,"","","")
  ...//文件服务用下面的保存图片方法
  ...s ret=##Class(MI.Common.MIFBase).SaveBase64ToMachine(mi,epis,graphType,base64Stream,epis_graphType_".bmp",ftpFfolderName)
  ...i ret'=1 d Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,"错误"_ret,"ret")
  d Last
  q

SendACK(mi,mshStr,ackType="AA",errCode=0,errDesc="Message accepted") //send 'ack' to instrument 
    N (mi,mshStr,ackType,errCode,errDesc)
    S mi=$g(mi),mshStr=$g(mshStr),ackType=$g(ackType),errCode=$g(errCode),errDesc=$g(errDesc)
    S ret=1,sb=$C(11),eb=$C(28),cr=$C(13)
    Q:('$l(mi))||('$l(mshStr)) ret
    //MSH|^~\&|BC-6800|Mindray|||20140909162225||ORU^R01|1|P|2.3.1||||||UNICODE
    S mshStr=$TR(mshStr,cr,"")
    S ret=0
    S msgRoutine=$P($P(mshStr,"|",9),"^",2)
    s Type=$P(mshStr,"|",14)
    S seq=$P(mshStr,"|",10)
    s $P(mshStr,"|",9)="ACK^R01"
    ;s msaStr="MSA|"_ackType_"|"_seq_"|"_Type_"||"
    s msaStr="MSA||"_ackType_"||ORU^R01|10|10|SampleResult||"
    D Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,sb_mshStr_cr_msaStr_cr_eb_cr,"H-->M")
    W sb,mshStr,cr,msaStr,cr,eb,cr,*-3
    Q ret 
  
SendACKNew(mi,mshStr,ackType="AA",errCode=0,errDesc="Message accepted") //send 'ack' to instrument 
    N (mi,mshStr,ackType,errCode,errDesc)
    S mi=$g(mi),mshStr=$g(mshStr),ackType=$g(ackType),errCode=$g(errCode),errDesc=$g(errDesc)
    S ret=1,sb=$C(11),eb=$C(28),cr=$C(13)
    Q:('$l(mi))||('$l(mshStr)) ret
    //MSH|^~\&|BC-6800|Mindray|||20140909162225||ORU^R01|1|P|2.3.1||||||UNICODE
    S mshStr=$TR(mshStr,cr,"")
    S ret=0
    S msgRoutine=$P($P(mshStr,"|",9),"^",2)
    s Type=$P(mshStr,"|",14)
    S seq=$P(mshStr,"|",10)
    s $P(mshStr,"|",9)="DSP^Q01"
    s msaStr="MSA|"_ackType_"|"_seq_"|"_Type_"||"
    D Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,sb_mshStr_cr_eb_cr,"H-->M")
    W sb,mshStr,cr,eb,cr,*-3
    Q ret 

SendQRD(mi,record,labno)
	N (mi,record,AckType,ErrCode,ErrDesc,mshStr,labno)
	s mi=$g(mi),record=$g(record),AckType=$g(AckType),ErrCode=$g(ErrCode),ErrDesc=$g(ErrDesc),mshStr=$g(mshStr),labno=$g(labno)
	S ret=1,sb=$C(11),eb=$C(28),cr=$C(13)
	Q:('$l(mi))||('$l(record))

	d ScanOne^MI.MIF000(mi,labno) ;创建上传化验项目列表
	S date=$tr($zd(+$h,3),"-")
	S time=$tr($zt($p($h,",",2)),":")
	///无对应样本，则返回消息为
	s MSH="MSH|^~\&|||Keyu|KUF10|"_date_time_"||QCK^Q02|4|P|2.3.1|||P|0||ASCII|||"_cr
	s MSA="MSA|AA|1|Application accepted|||0|"_cr
	s ERR="ERR|0|"_cr
	i '$D(^TMP("MIFTESTCODE",$j,mi,labno)) {
		s QAK="QAK|SR|NF|"_cr
		s mshStr=MSH_MSA_ERR_QAK
		w sb,mshStr,eb,cr,*-3
		D Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,sb_mshStr_eb_cr,"H->M")
		q
	}

	//返回QCK^Q02消息作应答
	s QAK="QAK|SR|OK|"_cr
	s mshStr=MSH_MSA_ERR_QAK
	;w sb,mshStr,eb,cr,*-3
	;D Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,sb_mshStr_eb_cr,"H->M")
	;h 1


  
	//返回查询应答QCK^Q02消息后,再发送医嘱数据消息DSR^Q03
	s MSH="MSH|^~\&|||Keyu|KUF10|"_date_time_"||DSR^Q03|1|P|2.3.1|||P|5||ASCII|||"_cr
	s MSA="MSA|AA|1|Application accepted|||0|"_cr
	s ERR="ERR|0|"_cr
	s QAK="QAK|SR|OK|"_cr
	s QRD="QRD|"_date_time_"|R|D|1|||RD|"_labno_"|OTH|||T|"_cr
	s QRF="QRF|KUF10|"_date_time_"|"_date_time_"|||RCT|COR|ALL||"_cr
	s VisitNumberDR = $o(^dbo.RPVisitNumberI("IndexVisitNumber",##Class(LIS.Util.Common).IndexData(labno),""))
	//标本信息
	s RPVisitNumberData=$g(^dbo.RPVisitNumberD(VisitNumberDR))
	s RegNo=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,3)
	s BedNo=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,27)
	s SurName=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,13)
	s Age=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,18)
	s SpeciesDR=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,15),Species=""
	i $l(SpeciesDR) s Species=$lg($g(^dbo.BTSpeciesD(SpeciesDR)),3)
	s DoctorDR=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,23),Doctor=""
	i $l(DoctorDR) s Doctor=$lg($g(^dbo.BTDoctorD(DoctorDR)),3)
	s LocationDR=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,22),Location=""
	i $l(LocationDR) s Location=$lg($g(^dbo.BTLocationD(LocationDR)),3)

	s tcx=""
	S chl="" F  S chl=$o(^TMP("MIFTESTCODE",$j,mi,labno,chl)) Q:chl=""  D
	.i $l(tcx) s tcx=tcx_"+"_chl
	.i '$l(tcx) s tcx=chl

	i tcx="Chemistry+Morphology" s tcx="ALL"
	i tcx="MorphologyChemistry" s tcx="ALL"

	//MSH|^~\&|||||20220111135302||QCK^Q02||P|2.3.1||||0|||||<CR>
    //MSA||QRY^Q02||||||<CR>
    //DSP|1|SampleID|1|1234567890|张三|男|21|岁|汉族|123|456|789|20220111134350|内科|李四|门诊|医保|All|||<CR><EB><CR>
    s MSH="MSH|^~\&|||||"_date_time_"||QCK^Q02||P|2.3.1||||0|||||"_cr
	s MSA="MSA||QRY^Q02||||||"_cr
	s DSPs="DSP|1|Barcode||"_labno_"|"_SurName_"|"_Species_"|"_Age_"|岁|汉族||"_RegNo_"|"_BedNo_"|"_date_time_"|"_Location_"|"_Doctor_"|||"_tcx_"|||"_cr
	s mshStr=MSH_MSA_DSPs
	w sb,mshStr,eb,cr,*-3
	D Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,cr_mshStr_eb_cr,"H->M")
	Q 

SendDSR(mi,record, AckType="AA",ErrCode=0,ErrDesc="Message accepted",mshStr,epis)
	 N (mi,record,AckType,ErrCode,ErrDesc,mshStr,epis)
	 s mi=$g(mi),record=$g(record),AckType=$g(AckType),ErrCode=$g(ErrCode),ErrDesc=$g(ErrDesc),mshStr=$g(mshStr),epis=$g(epis)
	 S ret=1,sb=$C(11),eb=$C(28),cr=$C(13)
	 Q:('$l(mi))||('$l(mshStr)) ret
	 //MSH|^~\&|BC-6800|Mindray|||20081120174836||ORM^O01|4|P|2.3.1||||||UNICODE
	 S mshStr=$TR(mshStr,cr,"")
	 S ret=0
	 S seq=$P(mshStr,"|",10)
   	 S $P(mshStr,"|",9)="ORR^O02"
   	 s isRecieve=""
   	 s wgDR=""
	 s isRecieve=epis 
	 s flag="AA"
	 s MSACode=seq
	  D Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,isRecieve,"isRecieve is ")
	 i ($l(isRecieve)<1)
	 {
		 ;s flag="AR"
	 }
	 i $ZCVT(epis,"U")=$ZCVT("Invalid","U"){
		 ;s flag="AR"
	 }
	 s MSA="MSA|"_flag_"|"_MSACode_"||||"
	 i flag="AR"{
		 S TMPCORDE=sb_mshStr_cr_MSA_cr_eb_cr
		 W sb,mshStr,cr,MSA,cr,eb,cr,*-3
		 D Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,TMPCORDE,"H->M")
	 }else{
	 s PatInfomation=""
	 s PatInfomation=$$GetPatInfo(epis,mi)
	 d Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,PatInfomation,"PatInfomation is")
	 s (RegNo,Name,Birth,Species,PatType,LOC,BedNo,Fee,Srcdocno,PatAge)=""
	 i $l(PatInfomation){
	 s RegNo=$p(PatInfomation,",",9)
	 s Name=$p(PatInfomation,",",10)
	 s Birth=$p(PatInfomation,",",29)
	 s Species=$p(PatInfomation,",",11)
	 i Species="1" s Species="Male"
	 i Species="2" s Species="Fmale"
	 s PatType=$p(PatInfomation,",",12)
	 s LOC=$p(PatInfomation,",",6)
	 s BedNo=$p(PatInfomation,",",13)
	 s Fee=$p(PatInfomation,",",5)
	 s Srcdocno=$p(PatInfomation,",",7)
	 s PatAge=$p(PatInfomation,",",14)
	 }
	 s PID="PID|1||"_RegNo_"^^^^MR||"_Name_"||"_Birth_"|"_Species
	 s PV1="PV1|1|"_PatType_"|"_LOC_"^^"_BedNo_"|||||||||||||||||"_Fee
	 s ORC="ORC|AF|"_epis
	 s curTime=$zd($h,8)_$tr($zt($p($h,",",2)),":","")
	 s randomNumber=1000+$r(1000)
	 s OBR="OBR|1|"_epis_"||00001^Worksheet Response^99MRC||"_curTime_"||||"_Srcdocno_"||||||||||||||HM"
	 s TestCodeDate=""
	 s TestCodeDate=$$SearchTestItem(mi,epis)
	 d Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,TestCodeDate,"TestCodeDate is")
	 s OBX="OBX|1|NM|30525-0^Age^LN||"_PatAge_"|yr|||||F"_cr_
		   "OBX|2|ST|01001^Remark^99MRC||Remark||||||F"_cr_
		   "OBX|3|NM|01008^Patient Area^99MRC||v44||||||F"
		S TMPORDER=sb_mshStr_cr_MSA_cr_PID_cr_PV1_cr_ORC_cr_OBR_cr_OBX_cr_TestCodeDate_eb_cr
		w sb,mshStr,cr,MSA,cr,PID,cr,PV1,cr,ORC,cr,OBR,cr,OBX,cr,TestCodeDate,eb,cr,*-3
		D Trace^MI.MIF000(mi,TMPORDER,"H->M")
	 }
	Q ret

SearchTestItem(mi,epis)
	//OBX|5|NM|^PT/INR^99MRC^pt-inr ||||||||F
    S tcx="",tc="",Num=4,TcNum=0
	d ScanOne^MI.MIF000(mi,epis)
  	i $d(^TMP("MIFTESTCODE",$j,mi,epis)){
	   f {
	 	s tc=$o(^TMP("MIFTESTCODE",$j,mi,epis,tc))
	 	q:tc=""
    	s tcx=tcx_"OBX|"_Num_"|NM|"_tc_"||||||||F"_cr
    	s TcNum=TcNum+1
    	s Num=Num+1
	 	 
  	}
  	}
    q tcx
  
    //d GetPatInfo^MI.MIFTCL2000NEW("31467239","109")
GetPatInfo(labno,mi)
    s labno = $g(labno),mi=$g(mi)
	i $l(labno)=0 q ""
	s VisitNumberDR = $o(^dbo.RPVisitNumberI("IndexVisitNumber"," "_labno,""))
	i '$l(VisitNumberDR) q ""
	//标本信息
	s RPVisitNumberData=$g(^dbo.RPVisitNumberD(VisitNumberDR))
	s LocationDR=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,22),Location=""
	i $l(LocationDR) s Location=$lg($g(^dbo.BTLocationD(LocationDR)),3)
	s DoctorDR=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,23),Doctor=""
	i $l(DoctorDR) s Doctor=$lg($g(^dbo.BTDoctorD(DoctorDR)),3)
	s ReceiveDate=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,66)
	s ReceiveTime=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,67)
	s ReceiveUserDR=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,68),ReceiveUser=""
	i $l(ReceiveUserDR) s ReceiveUser=$lg($g(^dbo.SYSUserD(ReceiveUserDR)),3)
	s RegNo=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,3)
	s SurName=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,13)
 	s GivenName=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,14)
	i SurName=GivenName s PatName=SurName
	e  s PatName=SurName_GivenName
	s SpeciesDR=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,15),Species=""
	i $l(SpeciesDR) s Species=$lg($g(^dbo.BTSpeciesD(SpeciesDR)),3)
	s AdmTypeDR=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,4),AdmType=""
	i $l(AdmTypeDR) s AdmType=$lg($g(^dbo.BTAdmissionTypeD(AdmTypeDR)),2)
	s BedNo=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,27)
	s Age=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,18)
	s BirthDate=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,16)
	s AgeUnitDR=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,19),AgeUnit=""
	i $l(AgeUnitDR) s AgeUnit=$lg($g(^dbo.BTAgeUnitD(AgeUnitDR)),3)
	s CollectDate=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,51)
	s CollectTime=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,52)
	s Diagnose=$lg(RPVisitNumberData,28)

  	s Sampleda=$zd($p($h,",",1),3)_" "_$zt($p($h,",",2))
	s Instrument = "XN"
	i $l(mi) s Instrument=$lg(^dbo.BTMIMachineParameterD(mi),22)
	s Sampleno=labno   //检测号
	s Sampletype=""
 	s Feetype="" ;费别
	s Srcdepno=Location  ;送检科室
  	s Srcdocno=Doctor   ;送检医生
  	s Userno=ReceiveUser ;检验医生(录入者)
	s Patno=RegNo ;登记号 ""
	s BarCode=""
  	s Patna=PatName   ;病人姓名
	s Sex=1  ;性别
	i Species="男" s Sex="F"     ;1:男 ，2 女
	i Species ="女" s Sex="M"
  	s Pattype=AdmType   ;病人类型
  	s Bedno = BedNo    ;床号
  	s Patage=Age  ;年龄
  	s Ageunit=""   ;年龄单位
  	s Reqno=labno  ;申请号 = 检验号
	s Reqda=""
	i $l(ReceiveDate) s Reqda=$e(ReceiveDate,1,4)_"-"_$e(ReceiveDate,5,6)_"-"_$e(ReceiveDate,7,8)_" "_$zt(ReceiveTime,2) ;送检日期 = 接收时间
	s Reportda=""   ;报告日期  = 初审(保存结果)时间
	s Printflag=""  ;打印标志
	s Resultflag=""  ;结果标志
	s Errflag=""  ;错误标志
	s Diagnose = Diagnose   ;诊断
	s Description=""  ;备注
	s Reserve=""  ;保留字段
	s Patnamn=""   ;姓名拼音码
	i $l(CollectDate) s Getda=$e(CollectDate,1,4)_"-"_$e(CollectDate,5,6)_"-"_$e(CollectDate,7,8)_" "_$zt(CollectTime,2) 
	e  s Getda=Reqda ;接收时间/采样日期
	s Wardno=""  ;病区
	s RetString=""
	s EpisodeNo=1
	s Diagnose=""
	s RetString=Sampleda_","_Instrument_","_Sampleno_","_Sampletype_","_Feetype_","_Srcdepno_","_Srcdocno_","_Userno_","
	s RetString=RetString_Patno_","_Patna_","_Sex_","_Pattype_","_Bedno_","_Patage_","_Ageunit_","_Reqno_","_Reqda_","
	s RetString=RetString_Reportda_","_Printflag_","_Resultflag_","_Errflag_","_Diagnose_","_Description_","_Reserve_","
	s RetString=RetString_Patnamn_","_Getda_","_Wardno_","_BarCode_","_BirthDate_","_EpisodeNo
	q RetString
